Scapegoat:Ritual.NAME: Ceremony
Scapegoat:Ritual.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Reburial !M!. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:FetterDagger.NAME: Contract Dagger
Scapegoat:FetterDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you lose HP, NL if this card in your discard pile, NL put it into your hand.

Scapegoat:ProbeStrike.NAME: Probe Strike
Scapegoat:ProbeStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends not to attack, NL Deal !D! damage again.

Scapegoat:CutThroat.NAME: Throat Cut
Scapegoat:CutThroat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply !M! Vulnerable.

Scapegoat:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Beat
Scapegoat:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to All enemies !M! times. NL Draw 1.

Scapegoat:SoulFlame.NAME: Soul Flame
Scapegoat:SoulFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to All enemies !M! times. NL Spark: Deal !D! damage to All enemies !M! times.

Scapegoat:TodoCard.NAME: TODO
Scapegoat:TodoCard.DESCRIPTION: 这张牌还没开始做！不要拿！

Scapegoat:Punish.NAME: Punishment
Scapegoat:Punish.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Reburial !M!.

Scapegoat:EquivalentSubstitution.NAME: Equivalent Exchange
Scapegoat:EquivalentSubstitution.DESCRIPTION: Recall !M!. NL Put a card from your hand into your draw pile.

Scapegoat:BloodyThorns.NAME: Blood Thorn
Scapegoat:BloodyThorns.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !Misc! Thorns. NL If Fatal, permanently increase this card's Thorns by !M!. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:AvoidCombat.NAME: Respite
Scapegoat:AvoidCombat.DESCRIPTION: Discard all attack cards in your hand then, NL draw that many cards. NL Gain !B! Block.

Scapegoat:GunSlinger.NAME: Gun-fu
Scapegoat:GunSlinger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reburial 3. NL Add !M! *Glass Bullet into your hand.

Scapegoat:SerialBullet.NAME: Glass Bullet
Scapegoat:SerialBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL If the enemy has no Bullet, apply !M! Bullet. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:DualMark.NAME: Double Imprint
Scapegoat:DualMark.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Return. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:Peeper.NAME: Peep
Scapegoat:Peeper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Recall !M!. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:Sacrifice.NAME: Offering
Scapegoat:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Whenever you lose HP by your NL own effect, at the end of NL combat, heal the same amount of HP.

Scapegoat:ForTheSin.NAME: Substitute
Scapegoat:ForTheSin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP by yourself, apply !M! times as many Bullets as you lose your HP to a random enemy.

Scapegoat:BloodForBlade.NAME: Blood For Blade
Scapegoat:BloodForBlade.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Add 1 *Cost into your hand.
Scapegoat:BloodForBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Add 1 *Cost into your hand.

Scapegoat:Cost.NAME: Cost
Scapegoat:Cost.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, NL lose 1 HP whenever NL you play another card NL Ethereal.

Scapegoat:Liquidation.NAME: Liquidation
Scapegoat:Liquidation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Bullet affects this card !M! times.

Scapegoat:Convergence.NAME: Congeal
Scapegoat:Convergence.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for every !M! cards in your discard pile.

Scapegoat:FalseAccusation.NAME: Sin Loaner
Scapegoat:FalseAccusation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Reburial, NL Gain !M! Return.
Scapegoat:FalseAccusation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Reburial, NL Gain !M! Return; NL Apply !M! Bullet to ALL enemies.

Scapegoat:Weave.NAME: Weave
Scapegoat:Weave.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Common cards into your draw pile.

Scapegoat:ReturnedBlade.NAME: Double Play
Scapegoat:ReturnedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Next turn, NL deal !2M! damage to a random enemy.

Scapegoat:AllOutParry.NAME: All Out Parry
Scapegoat:AllOutParry.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Reburial a card, Gain !M! Block. NL Reburial 3.

Scapegoat:BurnTheBoat.NAME: The Last Stand
Scapegoat:BurnTheBoat.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 HP. Draw !M!. Gain [E] [E]. NL You cannot draw additional cards this turn. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:PryIntoTruth.NAME: See The Truth
Scapegoat:PryIntoTruth.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade !M! cards in your draw pile for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:BloodVibration.NAME: Lai
Scapegoat:BloodVibration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, double its damage.

Scapegoat:SkilledChopping.NAME: Skill Target
Scapegoat:SkilledChopping.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this card's damage and Block by !M! this combat.

Scapegoat:MaliciousErosion.NAME: Demonize
Scapegoat:MaliciousErosion.DESCRIPTION: Play and a Exhaust a card, Draw cards equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.
Scapegoat:MaliciousErosion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play and a Exhaust a card, Draw cards equal to its cost.

Scapegoat:RunningFireOfTheDead.NAME: Last Stand
Scapegoat:RunningFireOfTheDead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Glass Bullet into your hand.
Scapegoat:RunningFireOfTheDead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Glass Bullet+ into your hand.

Scapegoat:DealWithDevil.NAME: Fiendish Deal
Scapegoat:DealWithDevil.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 HP. NL Whenever you end your turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

Scapegoat:MasteryOfFirearms.NAME: SimGuns
Scapegoat:MasteryOfFirearms.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Glass Bullet into your hand.
Scapegoat:MasteryOfFirearms.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Glass Bullet+ into your hand.

Scapegoat:DelayedFlame.NAME: Spread
Scapegoat:DelayedFlame.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Reburial a card, it cost 1 less [E] this turn. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

Scapegoat:ReturnToSilence.NAME: Deathly Stillness
Scapegoat:ReturnToSilence.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Reburial ALL cards in your draw pile. NL Recall !M!. NL Exhaust.
Scapegoat:ReturnToSilence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Reburial ALL cards in your draw pile. NL Recall !M!.

Scapegoat:EmergencyCall.NAME: On Call
Scapegoat:EmergencyCall.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Recall !M!. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:Vibration.NAME: Vibration
Scapegoat:Vibration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Shard to your draw pile.

Scapegoat:Shard.NAME: Shard
Scapegoat:Shard.DESCRIPTION: Recall !M!. NL Spark: Recall !M! Exhaust. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:Adaptability.NAME: Adaptability
Scapegoat:Adaptability.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, gain !M! Block next turn.

Scapegoat:RitualLunge.NAME: Ritual Slash
Scapegoat:RitualLunge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you lose HP in this turn, Heal !M! HP and Exhaust.

Scapegoat:Splash.NAME: Splash
Scapegoat:Splash.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Bullet. NL When the enemy dies, deal the damage equal to its Bullet !2M! times to ALL enemies.

Scapegoat:HeadStart.NAME: Start Shot
Scapegoat:HeadStart.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M!. NL Innate. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:BlazeAway.NAME: Continuous Fire
Scapegoat:BlazeAway.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Bullet to a random enemy !M! times.

Scapegoat:Gnaw.NAME: Gnaw
Scapegoat:Gnaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you break an enemy's Block. Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:SacrificeGarrotte.NAME: Slaughter
Scapegoat:SacrificeGarrotte.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card in this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

Scapegoat:ExtraordinaryFood.NAME: Energency Provisions
Scapegoat:ExtraordinaryFood.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 2 cards in your hand. Heal !M! HP for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:AimingShot.NAME: Aim
Scapegoat:AimingShot.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Bullet. NL All random Attacks now target this enemy. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:Binding.NAME: Binding
Scapegoat:Binding.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Immune lose HP by yourself this turn. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:SacrificeReplacement.NAME: Replacement
Scapegoat:SacrificeReplacement.DESCRIPTION: Stop lose HP by yourself this turn. NL When trigger, add !M! *Shard to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:DrinkPoisonToEndThirst.NAME: Harm Than
Scapegoat:DrinkPoisonToEndThirst.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Lose 12 HP at the next end of your turn. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:MarkerCapture.NAME: Imprint Marker
Scapegoat:MarkerCapture.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy with Bullet, Gain !M! Block.

Scapegoat:TurnBackForSin.NAME: Sin Transition
Scapegoat:TurnBackForSin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to !M! times Return gained this combat.

Scapegoat:CurtainCall.NAME: Encore
Scapegoat:CurtainCall.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Finale. NL Spark: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and increase this card's damage by !M! this turn.

Scapegoat:PriorRepair.NAME: Prior Repair
Scapegoat:PriorRepair.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next X turn, draw !M! and Gain [E] . NL Exhaust.
Scapegoat:PriorRepair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next X+1 turn, draw !M! and Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:SequinShard.NAME: Sequin Shard
Scapegoat:SequinShard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Spark: Gain [E] [E], Gain !M! Return.

Scapegoat:StockUp.NAME: Ace In The Hole
Scapegoat:StockUp.DESCRIPTION: Recall !M!. NL If only one was selected, add 2 copies of that cards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:BaresTheSoul.NAME: Soul Stripping
Scapegoat:BaresTheSoul.DESCRIPTION: Strip the soul of an enemy which has !M! HP. NL The damage taken by this soul is now returned to the enemy twice as much. (Overflow damage will also return). NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:GunSwordDance.NAME: Gun And Sword
Scapegoat:GunSwordDance.DESCRIPTION: Add X *Glass Bullet into your hand. NL Apply !M! Bullet to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Scapegoat:GunSwordDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X+1 *Glass Bullet into your hand. NL Apply !M! Bullet to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:BloodyCrown.NAME: Crooked Crown
Scapegoat:BloodyCrown.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has not been Stunned, lose !M! HP and stun this enemy. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:WashAway.NAME: Cleanse
Scapegoat:WashAway.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you have any debuffs, remove one of them and Reburial !M!.
Scapegoat:WashAway.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, if you have any debuffs, remove one of them and Reburial !M!.

Scapegoat:PunishmentForm.NAME: Punishment Form
Scapegoat:PunishmentForm.DESCRIPTION: Bullet will no longer decrease at the end of your turn. NL At the start of your turn, apply !M! Bullet to ALL enemies.

Scapegoat:SelfSacrifice.NAME: Self Sacrifice
Scapegoat:SelfSacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose 10 HP, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL If this card would kill you, heal ALL of your HP and this card gains Fleeting. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:Awe.NAME: Awe
Scapegoat:Awe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If the enemy's intends to attack, apply !M! weak.
Scapegoat:Awe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL If the enemy's intends to attack, apply !M! weak.

Scapegoat:Deflagration.NAME: Deflagration
Scapegoat:Deflagration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL You cannot play Attack card this turn.

Scapegoat:CounterAttack.NAME: Counter
Scapegoat:CounterAttack.DESCRIPTION: Double ALL damage sources from you when outside of your turn.
Scapegoat:CounterAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Double ALL damage sources from you when outside of your turn.

Scapegoat:Asterism.NAME: Asterism
Scapegoat:Asterism.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Recall card, Gain !M! Metallicize. NL Ethereal.
Scapegoat:Asterism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Recall card, Gain !M! Metallicize.

Scapegoat:TemporaryCollaboration.NAME: Short-term Cooperation
Scapegoat:TemporaryCollaboration.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Reburial !M!, Recall !2M!.

Scapegoat:Alpha2.NAME: Alpha
Scapegoat:Alpha2.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Beta into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Scapegoat:Alpha2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle a *Beta into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:Beta2.NAME: Beta
Scapegoat:Beta2.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Omega into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Scapegoat:Omega2.NAME: Omega
Scapegoat:Omega2.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL "enemies".
